valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 16 Oct 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 17 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: High Rockall 1034 expected Malin 1028 by 1800 Thursday. New high expected 1028 Faeroes by same time
